channel.title: Trophy Gold – The Roots of Old Kalduhr (West Marches)
channel.description:
*The Kalduhr is a vast and dangerous forest grown over the ruins of civilizations stretching back millenia. The most storied of these civilizations—though certainly not the oldest—is known as Old Kalduhr. Every treasure-hunter has heard of the ancient Kalduhri people. They know somewhere in the forest are the ruins of an ancient city. Searching the deep wood for these ruins requires a desperation or an arrogance to match the Old Kalduhri people. Roots of Old Kalduhr is a mega-incursion. Unlike regular incursions, there is no way a group of treasure-hunters can explore the entirety of it in one attempt—it is too vast, and must be explored again and again, perhaps with the same treasure-hunters who have survived to tell of the place, or perhaps with new treasure-hunters who have discovered it for themselves.*
![Roots of Old Kalduhr-sm|648x500](upload://fxA8MhRErtiWQMWzWlxiSE346qa.jpeg)
I am running a **Open Table / West Marches** Game of the Trophy Gold Megadungeon. The few first sessions have been lots of fun.
New players are always welcome. Each session is a one-shot incursion into the dungeon. No prior Trophy (Gold) experience needed. There will be a Discord Server for those players who want to interact with others exploring the megadungeon.
**Setting / Genre:** Dark/Grim Fantasy These events are scheduled to run for 2.5 hours. No recording is planned.
I am posting 4 sessions in total for now. It’s fine to attend only one or some of the sessions. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools Open Door, Lines & Veils, X-Card) will be in use.
**Content Notice** for the whole megadungeon from the Trophy Gold book: Abandonment, Amputation, Body Horror, Cannibalism, Classism, Confined Spaces, Graphic Violence, Harm to Animals, Harm to Children, Heights, Human Sacrifice, Insects & Spiders, Manipulation, Mannequins, Memory Loss, Mental Illness, Religion, Slavery, Snakes
[date=2023-02-09 time=06:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2023-02-09 time=08:30:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NNDoruJgWPnn7xJctuN [date=2023-02-10 time=06:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2023-02-10 time=08:30:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NNDpSrrWK83iw_REVD9 [date=2023-02-16 time=06:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2023-02-16 time=08:30:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NNDporQljBHZpJcCzW1 [date=2023-02-17 time=06:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2023-02-17 time=08:30:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NNDru4_CRZrE2qDAuxJ

item.description:
@adrian_rpg wrote:

The Kalduhr is a vast and dangerous forest grown over the ruins of civilizations stretching back millenia. The most storied of these civilizations—though certainly not the oldest—is known as Old Kalduhr. Every treasure-hunter has heard of the ancient Kalduhri people. They know somewhere in the forest are the ruins of an ancient city. Searching the deep wood for these ruins requires a desperation or an arrogance to match the Old Kalduhri people. Roots of Old Kalduhr is a mega-incursion. Unlike regular incursions, there is no way a group of treasure-hunters can explore the entirety of it in one attempt—it is too vast, and must be explored again and again, perhaps with the same treasure-hunters who have survived to tell of the place, or perhaps with new treasure-hunters who have discovered it for themselves.

Roots of Old Kalduhr-sm1602×1236 548 KB

I am running a Open Table / West Marches Game of the Trophy Gold Megadungeon. The few first sessions have been lots of fun.

New players are always welcome. Each session is a one-shot incursion into the dungeon. No prior Trophy (Gold) experience needed. There will be a Discord Server for those players who want to interact with others exploring the megadungeon.

Setting / Genre: Dark/Grim Fantasy
These events are scheduled to run for 2.5 hours. No recording is planned.

The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct will be in play and safety tools Open Door, Lines & Veils, X-Card) will be in use.
